ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Ask them which of them stands as guarantor for that!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Ask them: "Which of you is able to vouch for this?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Ask them: “Which of them can guarantee that?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), ask which of them can guarantee that on the Day of Judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Ask them, who among them is a guarantor for it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Ask them, which of them will stand as surety for that!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Ask them which of them will vouch for that,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Ask them, which of them will guarantee that!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Ask them (O Muhammad) which of them will vouch for that!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Ask them, which of them will vouch for that!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Ask then, which of them will stand thereof a surety?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Ask them, which of them will aver [any of] that!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Ask thou of them, which of them will stand surety for that!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Ask them, which of them will stand surety for that!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Ask them, which of them will guarantee that!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Ask them, which of them will guarantee that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Ask them which of them, for that [claim], is responsible.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:40] Ask them, which of them will aver, will guarantee for them, that?, [that] decision which they have made for themselves, namely, that they will be given better [reward] than the believers in the Hereafter?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Ask them) Muhammad (which of them will vouch for that) that they say!
